attributes.action: Convert unused state owned properties into flats for use by MPs and their families
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the accomodation would be available rent free for the use of mp's who live 50 miles or more outside London. They must furnish it from their salary. for those mp's who live within 50 miles of london let them commute as do many workers these days. if mp's do not wish to use the flats provided let them seek alternative accommodation at their own expence

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
